alert.note: Alert for Arthur; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Arthur, southeastern Grant, southern Hooker and western McPherson Counties through 530 PM CDT/430 PM MDT/... At 439 PM CDT/339 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Swan Lake, or 20 miles northeast of Arthur, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Swan Lake, Green Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Lena, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Cogill Lake, Schnick Lake, East Cody Lake, Shimmons Lake and Calora. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 183 and 193. Highway 97 between mile markers 43 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
